input_parameters.name: flow_name
input_parameters.description: Flow name (only autolaunched flows are supported)
input_parameters.title: Flow name (only autolaunched flows are supported)

input_parameters.name: metadata
input_parameters.title: JSON formatted metadata input (TS Only/WIP UI)

functions.title: Create a new issue
functions.description: Create a new GitLab project issue

input_parameters.name: project_id
input_parameters.description: The project where the issue is created
input_parameters.title: Project ID

input_parameters.name: issue_type
input_parameters.description: The type of issue. Valid options are: issue, incident, & test_case
input_parameters.title: Issue type

input_parameters.name: labels
input_parameters.description: Comma-separated label names for an issue
input_parameters.title: Labels

input_parameters.name: milestone_id
input_parameters.description: The Global ID of a milestone to assign the issue
input_parameters.title: Milestone

input_parameters.name: confidential
input_parameters.description: Set the issue to be confidential and only be visible to team members with at least Reporter access
input_parameters.title: Confidential

output_parameters.name: issue_iid
output_parameters.description: The issue's internal ID that is unique in the scope of the project
output_parameters.title: Internal issue ID

output_parameters.name: issue_url
output_parameters.description: The link to the issue on gitlab.com
output_parameters.title: Issue URL

output_parameters.name: issue_reference
output_parameters.description: A reference path to the issue in a group/project. Can be used for crosslinking issues.
output_parameters.title: Issue reference

input_parameters.description: Description of the bug or issue to create.

input_parameters.name: issueType

functions.title: Get a random GIF
functions.description: Returns a completely random GIF or a random GIF related to the word or phrase entered

input_parameters.name: tag
input_parameters.description: Filter results by a specified tag
input_parameters.title: Tag

input_parameters.name: rating
input_parameters.description: Filter results by a specified rating
input_parameters.title: Rating

output_parameters.name: web_url
output_parameters.description: A link to this GIF on giphy.com
output_parameters.title: Web URL

output_parameters.name: gif_url
output_parameters.description: The URL for the original version of this GIF that can be used for unfurling in Slack
output_parameters.title: GIF URL

functions.title: Convert words to GIF
functions.description: GIPHY Translate converts words and phrases to the perfect GIF using GIPHY's special sauce algorithm

input_parameters.name: weirdness
input_parameters.description: Value from 0-10 which makes results weirder as you go up the scale
input_parameters.title: Weirdness

output_parameters.name: web_url
output_parameters.description: A link to this GIF on giphy.com
output_parameters.title: Web URL

output_parameters.name: gif_url
output_parameters.description: The URL for the original version of this GIF that can be used for unfurling in Slack
output_parameters.title: GIF URL

functions.title: Add a Google Calendar Event - Beta
functions.description: This step creates event on primary Google calendar and sends out email to attendees.

input_parameters.name: attendees
input_parameters.title: Attendees
input_parameters.hint: This will accept comma separated emails.

input_parameters.name: start_time
input_parameters.description: The date, time, and timezone when the meeting starts
input_parameters.title: Start time

input_parameters.name: end_time
input_parameters.description: The date, time, and timezone when the meeting ends
input_parameters.title: End time

output_parameters.name: meeting_link
output_parameters.description: A link to a meeting information page where the meeting client is launched if the meeting is ready to start or join
output_parameters.title: Meeting link

output_parameters.name: meeting_number
output_parameters.description: The meeting number which can be used to join the meeting
output_parameters.title: Meeting number

output_parameters.name: host_webex_id
output_parameters.description: A unique identifier for the meeting host
output_parameters.title: Host Webex ID
